item.title: Escape room: Translating between RSEs and Arts & Humanities Researchers
item.description: CW21 Hack Day - 2021-03-31 to 2021-04-01 Cave-Brown-Cave-1916 - HP5-CW21 Hack Day idea proposer Idea name (provisional) Escape room: Translating between RSEs and Arts & Humanities Researchers (Part 1) Hack Day Demo Context and/or research domain Software development for research in the Arts and Humanities Problem Researchers in the Arts & Humanities can benefit greatly from research software, but often don’t have the kind of background in formally-structured design that a physicist or engineer does.
